name: Infinity Break
description:
INFINITY BREAK

A beautiful game drawn with only 8 colors (and my first attempt of this kind of project) 

FEATURES

  • 5 Difficult Stages
  • 1 Challenging Boss
  • Global Leaderboards
  • Normal and Easy Modes

Finding the game too hard? Click the ship on the main screen to activate "EASY" mode!

CREDITS

Horrendous code - Ian Lomas (please don't look)

Amazing Pixel Art - "279"

Music Composer - Phelippe Afonso

SFX - Miguel Abuel
